publications.name: La ciudad como sistema: metabolismo, resiliencia, y sustentabilidad
publications.summary: This article discusses the value of Nature based solutions to address climate change, biodiversity loss and public health crises in cities. It outlines strategies and approaches for decision makers to adopt NbS for urban resilience.

publications.name: The Critical Role of Nature-based Solutions for Enhancing Climate Resilience in Informal Areas: An Urban Supplement to the UNFCCC Technical Guidelines on National Adaptation Plans
publications.summary: This Guidance document provides supplementary guidelines on the importance of Nature-based solutions for informal areas in urban centers. It serves as a supplement to the UNFCCC technical guidlines for NAPs.

publications.name: Games in Planning: participatory planning for healthier cities
publications.summary: This article discusses the value of games as participatory planning tools and processes for inclusive urban planning. It highlights key concepts and outlines a framework for incorperatingi games into participatory planning processes.

publications.name: Healthier Cities and Communities through Public Spaces
publications.summary: This report discusses the importance and value that public spaces afford to the health and well-being of urban residents.
